Synopsis: Creates a new HTML tag with specified attributes and content.
Description: The New-HTMLTag function creates a new HTML tag with the specified tag name, attributes, and content. It supports self-closing tags, custom attributes, and new line formatting.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLTag -Tag "div" -Attributes @{ class = "container" } -Value { "Hello, World!" }
Creates a <div> tag with the class attribute set to "container" and the content "Hello, World!".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code: New-HTMLTag -Tag "img" -Attributes @{ src = "image.jpg"; alt = "Image" } -SelfClosing Creates an tag with the src and alt attributes set and is self-closing.
